title: Crash after getting app back from background after upgrade from 1.8 to 1.9
body:
# Bug Report

## Problem
After getting back from the background app is crashed.
Reopening app after a crash doesn't help to avoid issue.
After several manual relogins issue is not appeared anymore

#### Expected behavior
no crash

#### Actual behavior
app is crashed


### Reproduction

[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)

- Install 1.8
- Enable biometric authentication
- Upgrade to 1.9
- Login with face-id
- Put app to background and back


### Additional Information
- Status version: upgraded from 1.8 -> 1.9 build 1
- Operating System: Android, iOS

#### Logs

[status_logs.zip](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/files/5553398/status_logs.zip)
